item.title: US-Somali airstrike as battle rages for key town
item.description: Heavy fighting broke out on Wednesday after al-Shabab raided the town, saying they had captured it.

item.title: French jails have come under attack. Are violent drug gangs to blame?

item.title: Ex-Russian general jailed for seven years over bribes
item.description: Lt Gen Vadim Shamarin was sentenced to seven years in a penal colony after being accused of taking bribes.

item.title: Watch: BBC joins retirees aboard China's 'silver trains' that aim to boost economy

item.title: Reboot of disaster-hit Fyre Festival postponed, US media reports
item.description: The organisers of the failed 2017 Fyre Festival are reportedly looking for a new location for the reboot.
